description: This file defines the SupabaseRepository class responsible for handling all CRUD operations with a Supabase backend for notes, including methods for fetching, searching, adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving notes by ID.

classes.name: SupabaseRepository
classes.description: A class that encapsulates communication with a Supabase backend for CRUD operations on notes.

methods.name: buildRequestBuilder
methods.description: Constructs a Request.Builder object with the necessary headers and URL for a given API path.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Fetches all notes from the database and executes the provided success or failure callback.

methods.name: searchNotes
methods.description: Searches for notes matching a query in title or body and executes callbacks based on the result.

methods.name: addNote
methods.description: Adds a new note to the database and executes the result via callbacks.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID in the database.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID from the database.

methods.name: getNoteById
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID.
